name: Abandonded Nursery
description:
CULT BALM Abandoned Nursery The morbid silence of a strange town is broken when some noises are heard from inside of the abandoned nursery's building...

Step in your role as a detective in this interactive fiction and start finding clues.

Controls

Use <^> (Arrow Keys) to navigate and interact.

Follow CULT BALM Poster Artwork by Sheena Ankshie Audio Production by LAX HEAD
